Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: SM "DealFinder"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV based on price.  What I found out is that it looks great.  I think the colors and clarity are true.  The contrast is good.  The blacks are deep and no halo effect.  Seems like a good value.

Reviews.Title: Cant beat the price
Reviews.Author: AmazBuyer
Reviews.Content: I picked up this TV thinking that I will try for sometime and was looking for an excuse to return it back, and one good day, I found one... It stopped receiving HD signal from my QAM Cable. I was about to pack this baby back in its box. But boy, what I found was, my BlueTooth enabled cordless telephone base, which was placed just next to my TV, was interfering with Coby's HD tuner. So placed my telephone base away and everything started working fine.Even it spec says 720p, it receives 1080i from cable and 1080p signals from my PC, Logitech Revue and TiVo. PC can be used at 1920x1080 resulution.I wanted to take away one star for its conflict with cordless telephone, and at the same time add an extra star for its un-spec 1080p support.

Reviews.Title: COBY 32 " flat screen
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: This brand (or model) of TV needs to go back into development for issues with the sensors for reciving signals from the remote.  (I'm an engineer and have some work experiance with LCDs and remotes).We had (3) of the 32" cobys malfunction in a 1 month period.The first would turn off and on by itself (creepy), the second and third cobys that were sent to us as replacments would not accept a signal from the remote if you were operating the remote in a location from the center of the TV to anywhere on the left side.  If you were located on the right side of the TV the remote would operate the TV.Sadly we are going to not ask for a fourth replacement and just request a refund.Amazon was great to work with on both exchanges and the refund.  The best "exchange/refund" program I've ever dealt with.Coby customer service was also very nice to work with.

Reviews.Title: "Value" means fair price for the quality....
Reviews.Author: Dale Ransom
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these, a couple days ago for a good price. Yeah, I read the reviews on the "dreaded" sound - let me ask you something: for a 32" LCD TV at an average cost of $250.00, do you expect Carnegie Hall audio?? It has a great picture for the price, easy to set up, and is perfect for that bedroom, kids room, or as a gift for that retired mom or dad. My remote works fine, and the unit is programmable for my cable remote, as well.

Reviews.Title: horrible Tv
Reviews.Author: Thanh
Reviews.Content: After1 week, the tv stopped working. Sometime it pops really loud then u cant turn it backk on. Save ur money, buy a Samsung tv

Reviews.Title: For 230 Best value around
Reviews.Author: CRWCRW
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great price. Best value you can get. Does 720 max from a standard cable line, but hooked an XBox 360 up to it and it gets 1080i (Not 1080p but I can't tell the difference anyways).Awesome TV. Just great.

Reviews.Title: frustrated and upset
Reviews.Author: Laced with Happiness
Reviews.Content: DO NOT PURCHASE FOR ANYTHING!!!! I have learned my lesson to never purchase Coby again. It turned into a fake decorative piece and the customer service at Coby is horrible. Only had the tv for 3 1/2 months, but they will only send us a part AFTER we pay for the repair man to figure what is wrong then we have to pay installation. Now we are tv free as we have a baby on the way and can't afford a new one.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Melissa Lewis
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for Christmas last year. We had problems with it from the beginning, but only minor things at first. The picture would turn black and we attributed it to the xbox in the beginning. I had thought that maybe it was a bad connection. However, the tv has been getting worse and worse as time goes by. Now the picture will flicker and then freeze. It's bad quality and with being a single mom on a tight budget, I'm very upset that I made the wrong purchase.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working already
Reviews.Author: Notorious Fluffy G
Reviews.Content: This TV had it's drawbacks, but for the price it was fine. I used it for a monitor for my computer, which it was really bad at since it was hard to read small print, but it was adequate and I knew it wasn't the highest quality HD when I bought it. Since we don't have an antenna or cable service we used it watch Netflix, and it was fine for that. Until of course it stopped working after 17 months. Now it just turns on a dim blue glow and doesn't show anything including the volume channel and menu screens. If it had lasted I would have given it 1 or 2 more stars for being affordable at the time for people like me who don't organize their lives around HD TV, but I guess now I have to save up for a "real" TV or computer monitor. I'm starting to have Star Trek rerun withdrawals.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this model!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Klein
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model Coby TV - and wish that I hadn't. It worked for about about six months(Warranty is 90 days parts and labor), and then started to shut off on its own. Emailed Coby support and was told to ship it back (Georgia) and include $30. I no longer had the box or packing and figured it was going to cost at least $50 to ship it back. Including the $30 fee, it was really not worth doing. Will never buy another Coby product - ever.

Reviews.Title: lasts 15 months
Reviews.Author: kman
Reviews.Content: This TV always took a long time to turn on.  I guess I should have sent it back.  Now the standby light is black and it won't turn on.  It would cost more to repair than it's worth.Hate Coby.  Will never buy another product from them.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: Use the TV primarily for DVD and Bly ray movies, picture quality is fine, volume is a little different but all and all a great tv for a great price!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: east-tn
Reviews.Content: tv is great quality and for the price it's UNbeatable only Flaw it has is the sound is .not as loud as I expected so I got surround sound and now it's awesome

Reviews.Title: Coby 32 tv
Reviews.Author: Cecelia M. Clover
Reviews.Content: This was a good buy.  It has absolutely beautiful picture and very lightweight so it is easy to setup very pleased.

Reviews.Title: stay away at all cost
Reviews.Author: nizmo
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this TV got on in October and its already broken bottom half is white top half is fine. Sound is horrible. Again do not buy

Reviews.Title: Mono sound on a HDTV? No thanks.
Reviews.Author: Amanda Ruzin
Reviews.Content: This TV is super cheap because it has mono sound. I didn't even realize that TVs came without stereo sound these days, but apparently so. For $30 more you can get a much better TV, so save your money. This model has a single speaker coming out of the rear of the unit and sounds very muffled and tinny. Not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Quality
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: The TV broke within 3 hours... during those three hours the picture was pretty good for the price and it worked as a pretty good monitor. Apparently a majority of Coby televisions get this problem within a year, much faster in my case. You hear a pop noise then you suddenly can't turn it back on. If you're lucky enough to get it to last then I can see this being a good deal but, I'd rather spend the extra $50-100 dollars to have a TV that lasts. Atleast I can return it for a full refund since it broke the day I received it.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Product
Reviews.Author: erica s williams
Reviews.Content: Color tube went out in the tv the 2nd day of watching!!! Did not get a chance to enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Sound Quality
Reviews.Author: Marpel
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV and am returning it. The picture is ok for the money but the sound is awful! Called COBY & was told it must be defective. I'm returning it & will purchase an LG. It's only $50 more but has surround sound. This COBY has Mono

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this brand of TV
Reviews.Author: Sls
Reviews.Content: This TV from the reviews I read is horrible, when it arrived it had sound for about a minute then no sound.  When we were packing it back up we noticed how horrible it was put together.  When I was unscrewing the cable from the TV the cable connection popped out.  Not sure how they are still in business.

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Jay and Jay
Reviews.Content: Its my first HD LCD TV, and i'm loving it. I'm a gamer, I play alot of xbox 360 online and drastically the picture and quality and me seeing enemies and everything has gotten alot better. I have Battlefield 3 and I hated the game because everything was small and you can hardly see the enemies let alone your teammate names but not now, I can see everything now. Everything's bigger, brighter and better really. I even popped in a old game called Homefront and it actually looks great also. I haven't watched a movie yet, that will be later with my girl but for anyone thinking of buying a hdtv from amazon or the name coby tv, it's a great deal. It was shipped fast, nice easy to carry box, it was not heavy at all and set up is so child literate, my son could of set this up it was so easy.

Reviews.Title: Waste of hard earned money
Reviews.Author: Dennis Barnes
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this tv. Won't last 2years. Can't even give it 1 star., but I guess I have to. After only 1 1/2 years of little use, sure would be nice to get my money back

Reviews.Title: I would definately NOT recommend this television.
Reviews.Author: ASTOCK
Reviews.Content: I hooked the TV up and within the first hour of using my PlayStation (through HDMI 1) the TV made a loud pop and the screen froze in a half snow pattern. The same thing happened through all 3 HDMI ports (I tried them all).I highly recommend that you DO NOT purchase this television.

Reviews.Title: Coby went out of business in the summer of 2013
Reviews.Author: Vincent C.
Reviews.Content: Coby is now out of business. There is no manufacturer warranty available for this product.  Purchaser may have to rely on alternate sources of recompense since no Coby-manufacturer warranty is available.

Reviews.Title: Power Cord is Troublesome
Reviews.Author: Vegan Vampire
Reviews.Content: The main problem I have with this TV is that the power plug is installed directly into the TV; most TVs today have a power cord that can be unplugged from the TV.  When we set up the TV, we noticed that when we moved or touched the TV that the TV turned off.  The power cord seemed loose but since it was installed inside the TV, it couldn't be adjusted.  We bought two of these TVs and were not happy with them at all and have returned them to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Happy husband
Reviews.Author: D. Albright
Reviews.Content: My husband is very happy with the tv we ordered it for his room so that i am not stuck waching sports and it was dalivered promptly thanks.

Reviews.Title: Coby low end of the Television chain!
Reviews.Author: James Eveland "JimE"
Reviews.Content: Had it 1 day before warrenty stopped. 3 months it stopped working. Warrenty sucks. Find box to ship it in, put in a $30 money order to ship back. Check out after the 3 month warrenty, that really sucks. You have been warned

Reviews.Title: Would give it a 0
Reviews.Author: z24racerchic
Reviews.Content: if there was an option to.  freaking waste of money.  thing will not power on 95 days after I got it.  Called the manufacturer they said that they will either send me a part and get someone to fix it or send me a new tv in 2-3 weeks.  I said how do i know which? "You will get something in the mail".  it had horrible sound quality too.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and sound but remote didn't work
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Looked great out of the box, hooked it up and the picture was very nice and the sound was great but the remote for the television didn't work.  The remote didn't work past a few inches away from the television, hooked up a different remote and still had the same problem.  When we put the television back in the box we heard some rattling so we're guessing that it was damaged in warehouse or while shipping... it's sad because it was a great tv and for the price it was awesome but I guess you get what you pay for.  We returned this product.

Reviews.Title: sound
Reviews.Author: mvg
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for xmas 2011.  when I turned it on the picture was good. The sound was Bad mono only.  I had to turn it at 25 in order to hear.  That with bedroom window close. Coby service department is bad.  They finally told me my tv was defective.  I'm sending it back and I will buy a tv from someone else. I was going to buy seakers for it but no place to plug in.

Reviews.Title: Perfect, arrived in time.
Reviews.Author: mun100257
Reviews.Content: Perfect, arrived in time. 100% nuevo y perfecto, de verdad es una persona responsable lo felicito por la rapidez del envio. Thank you for the sale

Reviews.Title: great price, bad product
Reviews.Author: Isiah H
Reviews.Content: the price for the TV was amazing, maybe too good to be true. and it showed. everything arrived on time but the TV itself was faulty; even though the description said like new. more like, like broke
